185592726.review: Heard great things, graphics on steam make it unplayable. Requested a refund outside the 2 week window (22 mins of game play into it) and was denied refund. It is unfortunate there is no support for these issues. Can't recommend it.

184792159.review: Eine großartige offene Spielwelt. Nur die Hauptquest ist etwas kurz geraten. Wobei ich diese Kritik in Anführungszeichen setzen würde. Das Spiel ist schlichtweg eine Sandbox und die Story kam mir hierbei eher als Vehikel vor, um die Spielwelt und Mechaniken im Schnelldurchlauf vorzustellen. Den meisten Spaß hat man vermutlich, wenn man Gemea im eigenen Tempo erkundet.

184512927.review: i love this cute and cosy game so much i cannot reccomend it enough i used to play it on playstation back in 2017 or 2018 ish and didnt realise it was on steam until recently and have been addicted to it since!! i wish it was a more popular game so there could be merch made like i would buy a groffle plushie or backpack so fast <3 also the amount of love and detail put in to this game is so cute like the hidden sign saying u cant be there i remeber finding it while sneaking over the wall lol and the hidden ufo too is so cute its proberly the only game i can grind and play non stop without getting bored, i just bought grow song of the evertree and im so exited to play that too !! much love to the creators and if ur thinking of getting this game do it its perfect -lilybun7024

184483926.review:
Um ótimo jogo, ambientação incrível, bem tranquilo e organizado. Uma história até simples porém cativante e imersiva. Vale muito a pena jogar.
Um game relaxante e tranquilo.

184189477.review: This was just what I was looking for when it came to easy exploration game with tons of things to build and tasks to complete!

184165354.review: I've been curious about the game for a while now.  With it being on sale, I finally decided to give it a try.  It's been a nice experience so far.  The graphics are nice, as is the music.  There's no combat to my knowledge.  It's simply a relaxing game to play.  If I had to find something negative about the game.  It would be the lackluster create a character in the beginning of the game.  As well as not having a place to live in and decorate.  But those are minor complaints.  You can get a few cosmetics throughout the game.  So that's something at least.

183976393.review:
Cute game. I dont have much to say about it other than it being a nice and relaxing cozy game to play while listening to audiobooks or podcasts. Its not a deep experience, and dialogue is basic with a just as basic story, but I did enjoy building bridges, decorating my farms, fishing, planting trees and catching cats. 

I think my only criticism is that there are a few features that are time specific, like season, weather or time/day/night that it leads to a lot of waiting around and doing nothing when wanting those things for completionism. There really is not much past the game mechanics and no reason to really continue engaging with them if you already have 30 stacks of everything and are just standing around or walking in circles waiting for the spawn of a specific thing. 

In these periods, the only thing you really can do is go fishing and then trade fish for old coins or just dismiss a farm hand and stand around collecting poop or whatever.  or collect mystery seeds, make a tree farm, farm for the tree seeds and try to make each biome have its biome specific tree. End game really was just me standing around and staring at my phone and checking the game time, ngl.

183735565.review: Loved the vibe of this one but I got seriously motion sick after playing this so much so I psychically couldn't play this sadly.
